name: Katana's Path
description:
Katana's Path is a fast-paced arena arcade slasher, where you can control your samurai and your katana in a unique game mechanic. Slash through many enemies at a rainy cyberpunk city or colorful forests using the best gear you can get!

Features

  • Intense and frantic combat
  • Attack freely, move your katana in any direction
  • Kill the enemies with your katana and your throwing secondary weapon
  • Dynamic combo system
  • Various enemies to kill
  • Many equipments do unlock
  • Different levels to play
  • Endless hordes of enemies to play as much as you want

Different Arenas to Play!
